input.sentences: cosplay event getting the younger kids involved .
a young spiderman sitting on a bench .
a man dressed up as batman scowling .
fans taking photos of a dr. who prop .
cosplayers enjoying some refreshments on the bench .
output.sentences: Halloween is a wonderful time to get the kids involved and get their imaginations running.
Kids can dress up as any number of characters and it looks like spiderman made his rare appearance during today's festivities
Batman showed his face as well, scowling at the other superheros... I wonder if there will be a Spiderman VS Batman reenactment.
Families come from all over the country to dress up and partake in the days events.
Even the parents like to join in the fun and dress up as some of their favorite characters.
